BackstoryDef.title: Apocalypse survivor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born during a time of unrest on [PAWN_possessive] homeworld, as climate change threatened mass starvation and flooding. As [PAWN_pronoun] grew up, the situation worsened. Billions died and peaceful states descended into anarchy. [PAWN_nameDef] and [PAWN_possessive] parents did whatever they had to to survive.

BackstoryDef.title: Caravan traveler
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born to a family of nomadic merchants, [PAWN_nameDef] was mentored by [PAWN_possessive] father as a trader. [PAWN_pronoun] was often tasked with caring for the pack animals, and learned to hunt and to barter for [PAWN_possessive] food.

BackstoryDef.title: Caveworld tender
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in cave complex deep beneath the surface of an inhospitable world. [PAWN_pronoun] worked with the other children tending the tribe's fungus crops.

BackstoryDef.title: Caveworld tunneler
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a digger in a massive underground cave complex. [PAWN_pronoun] knows rock so well that [PAWN_pronoun] can almost navigate caves by smell.

BackstoryDef.title: Child spy
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Children are often presumed innocent, and can be ideal as spies. [PAWN_nameDef] was trained in the art of infiltration and information-gathering when [PAWN_pronoun] was just nine years old. [PAWN_possessive] years behind enemy lines and the war-torn nature of [PAWN_possessive] homeworld meant [PAWN_pronoun] had limited opportunity for education.

BackstoryDef.title: Child star
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was well-known throughout [PAWN_possessive] homeworld as a child actor in films and TV shows. [PAWN_possessive] fame put [PAWN_objective] in contact with many different kinds of people, but also tended to get in the way of [PAWN_possessive] education.

BackstoryDef.title: Cult child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into a powerful cult which shunned advanced technology and believed that all illness could be cured by cleansing the soul through sacred art. After [PAWN_possessive] first glimpse of the outside world, [PAWN_pronoun] decided to run away.

BackstoryDef.title: Foundry apprentice
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up as an apprentice in the foundries of an industrial world. This experience gave [PAWN_objective] metalworking skills and strong muscles, but stunted [PAWN_possessive] artistic development.

BackstoryDef.title: Frightened child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up with a laundry list of phobias and neuroses. [PAWN_pronoun] feared, among other things, doctors and foodborne pathogens. As a result, [PAWN_pronoun] learned to cook and care for [PAWN_objective]self, but many of [PAWN_possessive] fears dog [PAWN_objective] in adulthood.

BackstoryDef.title: Industrial orphan
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] never knew [PAWN_possessive] parents. [PAWN_possessive] earliest memories were of drudgery in the mines and workhouses of [PAWN_possessive] industrial world. Because of this, [PAWN_pronoun] never received a proper education.

BackstoryDef.title: Medical assistant
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born during a catastrophic war in which both sides used napalm extensively. [PAWN_pronoun] grew up helping [PAWN_possessive] parents in an infirmary, treating the cascade of horrific burns from the battlefields. [PAWN_pronoun] was left with a lifelong fear of fire.

BackstoryDef.title: Military cadet
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Raised in the military traditions of [PAWN_possessive] forefathers, [PAWN_nameDef] was taught from a young age that [PAWN_pronoun] would be a great leader and a hero of [PAWN_possessive] family. [PAWN_pronoun] excelled at [PAWN_possessive] studies and graduated from the academy with honors.

BackstoryDef.title: Music lover
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: As a child, [PAWN_nameDef] had a talent for playing musical instruments and singing. [PAWN_pronoun] was given expert training and loved to perform in recitals and concerts, though the lavish praise [PAWN_pronoun] received made [PAWN_objective] a little self-obsessed.

BackstoryDef.title: Mute
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was greatly affected by a traumatic event early in [PAWN_possessive] life. For many years [PAWN_pronoun] refused to speak to people, preferring instead to play with [PAWN_possessive] household's numerous pets.

BackstoryDef.title: Organ farm
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised in an illegal underground organ farm. [PAWN_possessive] body was used to grow organic implants for wounded mercenaries. Though [PAWN_possessive] upbringing has left [PAWN_objective] haunted, it has also given [PAWN_objective] a unique understanding of human biology.

BackstoryDef.title: Refugee
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: War broke out in [PAWN_nameDef]'s home when [PAWN_pronoun] was a baby. [PAWN_possessive] parents fled with [PAWN_objective], seeking safety wherever they could find it. [PAWN_nameDef]'s earliest memories are of being taught how to defend [PAWN_objective]self. The violence and destruction [PAWN_pronoun] witnessed left [PAWN_objective] scarred for life.

BackstoryDef.title: Scout
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born to colonial administrators from a small imperial power, [PAWN_nameDef] was enrolled in a youth program that taught military scouting skills. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to survive in the wilderness, to obey, and not to ask questions.

BackstoryDef.title: Shelter child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a shelter deep beneath a toxic world. [PAWN_pronoun] received a comprehensive education, but had no opportunity to do physical labour.

BackstoryDef.title: Shopkeeper
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s mother was often ill, and it fell to [PAWN_objective] to run the store which was their only source of income. [PAWN_pronoun] learned a little about the exotic artifacts which [PAWN_pronoun] sold, and a lot about the art of the deal.

BackstoryDef.title: Sickly child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: As a child, [PAWN_nameDef] suffered from a rare disease. Quarantined in a research hospital, [PAWN_pronoun] had minimal human contact and got little physical exercise. In the sterile hospital environment, however, [PAWN_pronoun] became very familiar with science and medicine.

BackstoryDef.title: Story writer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: As a child, [PAWN_nameDef] was addicted to reading. [PAWN_pronoun] would spend all day in [PAWN_possessive] local library with [PAWN_possessive] nose in a book. When budget cuts forced the library to close, [PAWN_nameDef] was distraught. [PAWN_pronoun] decided to fill the gap by writing [PAWN_possessive] own stories instead.

BackstoryDef.title: Superhero
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a superhero. OK, [PAWN_pronoun] didn't actually have any powers, but [PAWN_pronoun] did wear a colorful outfit, and enjoyed saving cats in distress and helping old ladies cross the street. [PAWN_pronoun] always seemed to lose [PAWN_possessive] lunch money to villains, though.

BackstoryDef.title: Test subject
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: On the most corrupt urbworlds, scientists without a moral compass commit unspeakable atrocities in the name of research. [PAWN_nameDef] was kept alone in a sealed facility from birth and subjected to a variety of behavioural experiments in an attempt to turn [PAWN_objective] into a perfect super-soldier.

BackstoryDef.title: Upper urbworlder
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] had a privileged childhood on a major urbworld. Living in an apartment far above the dense poverty of the city, [PAWN_pronoun] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] time reading or drawing the cityscape [PAWN_pronoun] saw through [PAWN_possessive] window.

BackstoryDef.title: Urbworld urchin
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: The urbworlds are ancient and deep industrial cityscapes bursting with humanity and poison. [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in the dark, unwanted reaches of such a place. [PAWN_pronoun] had to fight for every scrap of food.

BackstoryDef.title: Vatgrown soldier
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] wasn't made as a person, but as an instrument of destruction. Grown in a bioweapons facility and taught combat during [PAWN_possessive] accelerated growth, [PAWN_nameDef] still has a proclivity for combat of all kinds and an aversion to human contact.

BackstoryDef.title: Wreckage explorer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Two generations before [PAWN_nameDef] was born, an apocalyptic war dragged [PAWN_possessive] home planet into anarchy. [PAWN_nameDef] was tasked with watching [PAWN_possessive] tribe's herds, but often shirked [PAWN_possessive] duties to go exploring the crashed warships scattered around the planet.

BackstoryDef.title: Young reader
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] always liked to read books... as many as [PAWN_pronoun] could find, on pretty much any subject at all. But [PAWN_pronoun] didn't have many friends, because [PAWN_pronoun] didn't have time for them.

BackstoryDef.title: Academy student
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] attended a military academy. [PAWN_pronoun] was very tall and was known for [PAWN_possessive] good looks. Though [PAWN_pronoun] worried more about [PAWN_possessive] hairstyle than [PAWN_possessive] grades, [PAWN_pronoun] still somehow managed to pass [PAWN_possessive] final exams.

BackstoryDef.title: Amateur astronomer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was fascinated with astronomy. [PAWN_pronoun] would spend hours gazing at planets and nebulae through [PAWN_possessive] telescope. [PAWN_pronoun] is credited with discovering a small comet that would, years later, strike a nearby moon and disrupt its mining operations.

BackstoryDef.title: Amateur botanist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Spending many summers crawling through dirt, [PAWN_nameDef] found that [PAWN_pronoun] had quite a green thumb.

BackstoryDef.title: Artful dodger
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up on the streets of an urbworld, fending for [PAWN_objective]self from a young age. [PAWN_pronoun] never trusted anyone, relying on [PAWN_possessive] persuasiveness and [PAWN_possessive] cunning to survive. [PAWN_pronoun] eventually became skilled with firearms and knives as well as with words.

BackstoryDef.title: Aspiring engineer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] had a fascination with gadgets and gizmos. [PAWN_pronoun] took apart and put back together almost anything [PAWN_pronoun] could find. [PAWN_pronoun] became good at repairing toys brought to [PAWN_objective] by other children, and even fixed a few devices from [PAWN_possessive] elders.

BackstoryDef.title: Aspiring pop idol
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was groomed from a young age by company handlers determined to make [PAWN_objective] a pop idol. An exhausting regime of training in song and dance meant that [PAWN_pronoun] never knew manual labor, but learned a lot about music and social etiquette.

BackstoryDef.title: Awkward nerd
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Always fascinated by machines, [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] time studying robotics and holography. [PAWN_pronoun] preferred the company of [PAWN_possessive] scientific creations to that of other humans.

BackstoryDef.title: Blackjack player
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: The only useful skill [PAWN_nameDef] learned from [PAWN_possessive] tough military school was card counting. [PAWN_pronoun] amassed cash, but also enemies, by cheating regularly at casinos.

BackstoryDef.title: Blessed child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born under auspicious circumstances to a midworld spiritual group, and was held in reverence throughout [PAWN_possessive] childhood. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to take care of the poor and to give succor to the faithful from an early age.

BackstoryDef.title: Bookworm
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] youth in the library, reading every book [PAWN_pronoun] could find about the technical marvels of space travel, the engineering ingenuity of the space-faring pioneers, and the horrible yet fascinating ravages of the mechanoid races. [PAWN_pronoun] vowed that one day, [PAWN_pronoun] would see those things for [PAWN_objective]self.

BackstoryDef.title: Bully
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] childhood stealing other kids' lunch money.

BackstoryDef.title: Child of glass
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised underground on a "marble" planet, a wasteland of radioactive glass and toxic fallout. To survive on a planet devoid of life, [PAWN_pronoun] had to learn how to farm underground and how to fight without wasting bullets.

BackstoryDef.title: Child slave
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born to a poor family on a rimworld. [PAWN_possessive] father sold [PAWN_objective] into slavery at a young age, and [PAWN_pronoun] was traded many times. A tycoon eventually bought [PAWN_objective] as part of a child labor force and sent [PAWN_objective] down into mines to tend to and toil alongside the mining machines.

BackstoryDef.title: Child soldier
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born on a violent urbworld, [PAWN_nameDef] was trained from a young age to fight the wars of others, and became rather good at it.

BackstoryDef.title: Circus performer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Growing up in the circus, [PAWN_nameDef] learned a lot of interesting things. More interesting then the balls [PAWN_pronoun] juggled were the pockets [PAWN_pronoun] picked between shows. A mistake with some firesticks caused [PAWN_objective] to develop a deathly fear of fire.

BackstoryDef.title: Crime boss' child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the adopted child of a notorious crime boss. [PAWN_pronoun] was taught all facets of the family business, from bribery and smuggling to torture and even murder.

BackstoryDef.title: Diplomat's child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born to a diplomatic family. Travelling often, [PAWN_pronoun] was home-schooled and saw the world mostly through computers. But [PAWN_pronoun] learned the value of communication and negotiation.

BackstoryDef.title: Dreamer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an expressive child. [PAWN_pronoun] sang often, and made friends very easily. [PAWN_pronoun] never avoided hard work, but always dreamed of leaving [PAWN_possessive] home and exploring new worlds.

BackstoryDef.title: Drug mule
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Raised in an orphanage, [PAWN_nameDef] turned towards gang life at age ten. [PAWN_pronoun] was exploited by a local gang as a drug mule.

BackstoryDef.title: Factory worker
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a large factory city on an industrial world. Since poverty was rampant and food scarce, [PAWN_pronoun] worked for whatever wages [PAWN_pronoun] could get. This wasn't an easy life, but [PAWN_nameDef] never shied away from a hard day's work.

BackstoryDef.title: Farm hand
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born and raised on a farm on a small colony world. Preferring hands-on tasks and the outdoors, [PAWN_pronoun] avoided softer jobs that might have kept [PAWN_objective] cooped up inside. This helped [PAWN_objective] build independence, spirit, and a well-rounded character.

BackstoryDef.title: Fat kid
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was always picked last in gym, which made [PAWN_objective] sad. [PAWN_nameDef] ate because [PAWN_pronoun] was sad, and [PAWN_pronoun] was sad because [PAWN_pronoun] ate.

BackstoryDef.title: Hacker kid
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born on a high-tech world, [PAWN_nameDef] learned to hack computers at a young age. Spending hours tinkering alone made [PAWN_objective] very good with machines, but very bad with humans.

BackstoryDef.title: Ice planet child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Growing up on the frozen wastes of an ocean moon, [PAWN_nameDef] had only animals and a few hard-bitten sailors as companions. The lack of social interaction led [PAWN_objective] to develop a interest in engineering. But [PAWN_pronoun] never showed any great fondness for other humans.

BackstoryDef.title: Idealistic cadet
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Raised in the military traditions of [PAWN_possessive] forefathers, [PAWN_nameDef] was taught from a young age that [PAWN_pronoun] would be a great leader and the hero of [PAWN_possessive] family. [PAWN_pronoun] excelled at [PAWN_possessive] studies and graduated from the academy with honors.

BackstoryDef.title: Imperial student
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] studied on an imperial midworld where guns were banned and self-defense study was encouraged. The relative safety allowed [PAWN_objective] to focus on [PAWN_possessive] botanical research.

BackstoryDef.title: Indworld urchin
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up on the streets of a world in the early stages of its industrial revolution. [PAWN_pronoun] passed [PAWN_possessive] days stealing, begging and tinkering with discarded machine scraps, always on the lookout for a way to escape poverty.

BackstoryDef.title: Joywire addict
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s wealthy parents provided everything [PAWN_pronoun] wanted. After [PAWN_pronoun] discovered joywires, [PAWN_pronoun] became obsessed. Once [PAWN_possessive] parents realized what was happening, though, they cut [PAWN_objective] off, pushing [PAWN_objective] into a cycle of violence and depression.

BackstoryDef.title: Lab-grown child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in a laboratory as part of an altruistic but failed attempt to create a new class of human. [PAWN_possessive] childhood was filled with books and one-on-one tutoring. [PAWN_pronoun] was awkward, shy, and naive to the true nature of humanity.

BackstoryDef.title: Midworld geek
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a quiet suburban neighborhood. [PAWN_pronoun] was never a master of social interaction, but [PAWN_possessive] interest in computers blossomed into a true talent at an early age.

BackstoryDef.title: Midworld loner
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born on a sparsely-populated midworld, [PAWN_nameDef] had few friends. [PAWN_pronoun] preferred to pursue [PAWN_possessive] passions in solitude, whether it be tinkering with [PAWN_possessive] motorbike, watching lengthy vidcasts about the hottest new tech, or lining up [PAWN_possessive] figurines and shooting them down with [PAWN_possessive] pellet gun.

BackstoryDef.title: Military brat
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a family with a rich military background. [PAWN_possessive] teenage years were spent traveling from system to system, wherever [PAWN_possessive] parents were deployed.

BackstoryDef.title: Military recruit
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born on a midworld run by an intensely militaristic dictatorship. From a young age, [PAWN_pronoun] was trained to be a good soldier, learning how to fight with both firearms and melee weapons.

BackstoryDef.title: Naturalist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up on a backwater planet with minimal education. [PAWN_pronoun] had to hunt and grow food to survive. [PAWN_possessive] family's home was frequently raided by scavengers, which made [PAWN_objective] slow to trust anyone [PAWN_pronoun] didn't know.

BackstoryDef.title: Nerd
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was curious about everything. While other kids played tag in the suburbs of [PAWN_possessive] industrial home city, [PAWN_nameDef] read every book [PAWN_pronoun] could find about technology, robots, weapons, and whatever else seemed cool. A minor speech impediment made it difficult for [PAWN_objective] to make friends.

BackstoryDef.title: Officer cadet
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a cadet in an officer training corps. From a young age, [PAWN_pronoun] trained to be a leader. [PAWN_pronoun] became proficient with a variety of weapons, skilled in various survival techniques, and capable of assessing and combating threats from both strategic and tactical perspectives.

BackstoryDef.title: Pet sitter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] loved animals and spent a good amount of [PAWN_possessive] time looking after other people's pets. They (the pets, mostly, but also the people) always seemed to like [PAWN_objective].

BackstoryDef.title: Rich kid
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up on a midworld with loving parents, a cute pet and a lot of money, but no companions. [PAWN_pronoun] was always told by [PAWN_possessive] father, "Those peasants just want your money." [PAWN_nameDef] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] time alone, or fighting and mocking the "peasants" who might otherwise have become [PAWN_possessive] friends.

BackstoryDef.title: Sandbox architect
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent all of [PAWN_possessive] time as a child playing in the sandbox. While other children would pile up a mound of sand in the center of the box, call it a castle, then immediately destroy it, [PAWN_nameDef] would design and build beautiful castles with courtyards and walls with crenellations punctuated by towers. [PAWN_pronoun] often got into fist fights with the other children when they tried to destroy [PAWN_possessive] work.

BackstoryDef.title: Scavenger
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in one of the few remaining cities on a world ravaged by nuclear war. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to survive on [PAWN_possessive] own in this post-apocalyptic wasteland by scavenging for technology and supplies.

BackstoryDef.title: Ship technician
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an apprentice technician on a trade ship plying the routes between the stations and planets of [PAWN_possessive] home system. In this job, [PAWN_pronoun] learned to fix and improve many machines.

BackstoryDef.title: Smuggler
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s parents used [PAWN_objective] to help smuggle contraband between worlds. Aided by [PAWN_possessive] small size, [PAWN_nameDef] became very adept at carrying out [PAWN_possessive] parents' missions, learning weaponry, negotiations, and most of all, smuggling.

BackstoryDef.title: Speeder racer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the child of a fern farmer. [PAWN_pronoun] found [PAWN_possessive] first love in speeder racing, zipping in and out of the massive canopies and gorgeous vistas of [PAWN_possessive] homeworld's towering forests. The seedy underworld of racing also forced [PAWN_objective] to learn to defend [PAWN_objective]self with a quick word or a quicker shot.

BackstoryDef.title: Station orphan
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born on a deep space station, [PAWN_nameDef] was orphaned at a young age. [PAWN_pronoun] grew up in the claustrophobic bowels of the station, always surrounded by steel and technology. [PAWN_pronoun] survived by doing filthy jobs and, when necessary, stealing. [PAWN_pronoun] was nearly an adult before [PAWN_pronoun] even stepped foot on a natural world for the first time.

BackstoryDef.title: Street kid
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Growing up on the streets of a desert planet, [PAWN_nameDef] had to grow up fast. [PAWN_pronoun] learned early that [PAWN_pronoun] could fool people into connecting with [PAWN_objective], and then take advantage of them.

BackstoryDef.title: Street urchin
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born to a poor family on an urbworld, [PAWN_nameDef] was abandoned on the streets at a young age. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to steal and to fight in order to survive, gaining skills in melee and ranged combat. There was little room for trust in [PAWN_possessive] life, though.

BackstoryDef.title: Student
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] studied chemistry and quantum mechanics for entertainment, and human psychology for personal gain. [PAWN_pronoun] became very good at convincing other students to do [PAWN_possessive] chores.

BackstoryDef.title: Super soldier
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s government ran an experimental super-soldier development program. They kidnapped hundreds of infants, conditioned their minds with drugs and machines, and trained them to fight. [PAWN_nameDef] was one of the few to survive the process.

BackstoryDef.title: Tech enthusiast
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] had all the latest gadgets as a child. [PAWN_pronoun] spent all of [PAWN_possessive] time playing games with AIs instead of with other children. [PAWN_pronoun] always felt awkward around people.

BackstoryDef.title: Toxic child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Growing up on an industrial planet, [PAWN_nameDef] started working in a chemical plant at the age of six. Years of exposure to industrial toxins left [PAWN_objective] mentally and physically scarred.

BackstoryDef.title: Traders' child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a family of nomadic traders, making a living from buying and selling goods on many worlds. [PAWN_nameDef] learned the customs and methods of trade of many cultures by participating in [PAWN_possessive] parents' business.

BackstoryDef.title: Urbworld criminal
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born into bad circumstances on an overpopulated urbworld, [PAWN_nameDef] turned to small-time crime as a way to avoid starvation and hypothermia. Robbery and violence were daily activities. [PAWN_pronoun] learned that surviving was winning.

BackstoryDef.title: Vatgrown engineer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was vatgrown as an engineer in an illegal urbworld laboratory. As a young child, [PAWN_pronoun] was taught to tinker, build, and research. For most of [PAWN_possessive] childhood, [PAWN_pronoun] knew nothing else.

BackstoryDef.title: Vatgrown medic
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Raised to be a combat medic, [PAWN_nameDef] was trained in firearms as well as medicine.

BackstoryDef.title: Vatgrown slave
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was vatgrown as a slave in an illegal urbworld laboratory. As a young child, [PAWN_pronoun] was taught only to cook, clean, and serve [PAWN_possessive] masters. For most of [PAWN_possessive] childhood, [PAWN_pronoun] knew nothing else.

BackstoryDef.title: Winerunner
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Abandoned by [PAWN_possessive] parents, [PAWN_nameDef] was raised by monks in a quiet monastery. The monks taught [PAWN_objective] discipline and hard work. In return, [PAWN_pronoun] would go into the city and acquire exotic wines for the monks' nightly tastings.

BackstoryDef.title: Young psychologist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born and raised on a poor midworld, in the front passenger seat of [PAWN_possessive] mother's cab. Watching pedestrians and listening to the taxi passengers all day long, [PAWN_pronoun] soon became very good at figuring out someone's true desires and intentions.

BackstoryDef.title: Youth soldier
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into a long line of soldiers, and followed that heritage, joining a military training program. [PAWN_pronoun] excelled in all physical training programs, and even passed most of the intellectual exams. While [PAWN_pronoun] was never particularly bright or nimble, [PAWN_nameDef] learned the value of hard work and suffering.

BackstoryDef.title: Dusty farm hand
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Almost from the day [PAWN_pronoun] learned to walk, [PAWN_nameDef] had to help care for the animals and crops that [PAWN_possessive] people tended in their arid homeland. The difficult work toughened [PAWN_objective], but left little time for intellectual activities.

BackstoryDef.title: Plague child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born on a world wracked by plague, [PAWN_nameDef] lost family members and friends to the disease at a young age. [PAWN_pronoun] learned some medicine from the plague doctors, but was mentally scarred by the ordeal, and tends to keep others at an emotional distance.

BackstoryDef.title: Street peddler
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Growing up poor on an industrial midworld, [PAWN_nameDef] helped support his family by making small trinkets and novelties to sell to passersby. [PAWN_pronoun] also learned, of necessity, to fight back against those who tried to take [PAWN_possessive] trinkets by force.

BackstoryDef.title: Writer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: An enthusiastic student of many subjects, [PAWN_nameDef] also had a talent for writing, and so became the author of a popular online journal. Writing anonymously, to hide [PAWN_possessive] age, [PAWN_pronoun] expounded on topics ranging from bioethics to political theory to xenosociology.

BackstoryDef.title: Discarded youth
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up isolated on a "trash" planet, the dumping ground for nearby glitterworlds. It was a harsh home, that required [PAWN_objective] to create from junk much of what [PAWN_pronoun] needed to survive. Against the odds, [PAWN_pronoun] not only survived, but thrived.

BackstoryDef.title: Antisocial child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] lacked typical social skills, and deliberately avoided social interaction. [PAWN_pronoun] gained satisfaction only from steady work. [PAWN_pronoun] especially disliked speaking with overly creative or outgoing individuals.

BackstoryDef.title: Desert rat
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born to a tribe of desert ascetics who wandered the endless wastes. They sought a mythical substance they believed could liberate them from ignorance through psychedelic revelation, and usher in a new period of interstellar peace. But while [PAWN_pronoun] learned a fair bit about medicine and psychedelic drugs, revelation and peace remained elusive.

BackstoryDef.title: Pet keeper
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] childhood tending the animals [PAWN_pronoun] had bought or rescued. [PAWN_pronoun] saw far more beauty in natural things than in fabricated objects, and often chose the company of [PAWN_possessive] pets over that of [PAWN_possessive] peers.

BackstoryDef.title: Corporate slave
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a colony owned by a large glitterworld corporation. Implanted with a virtual reality device at a young age, [PAWN_pronoun] was raised in a brutal digital world. Constantly forced to fight others for the entertainment of the wealthy, gun play and tactics became the center of [PAWN_possessive] universe.
